Inclusions.title: Accommodation
Inclusions.description: 3 nights in Madrid, 3 nights in Barcelona, 3 nights in Rome

Inclusions.title: International flights
Inclusions.description: International direct round trip economy ticket by Egypt Air

Inclusions.title: Accommodation
Inclusions.description: 3 nights in Venice, 3 nights in Zurich, 3 nights in Prague

Inclusions.title: International flights
Inclusions.description: International direct round trip economy ticket by Emirates

Exclusions.description: Schengen entry visa (7,200 EGP per Adult & 4,200 EGP per Child)
Any other items not mentioned above
Paris City Tax: 8.11 EUR per person per Night, to be paid directly to the hotel upon check in.
Amsterdam City Tax: 3.00 EUR per person per Night, to be paid directly to the hotel upon check in/out.

Notes.description: Contact us on 19294 for further details & package confirmation.
Deposit of 500 Euro is required for Confirmation.
Payment can be done in EUR or via online payment link with same official bank exchange rate plus credit card percentage bank fees.
Optional tours are based on minimum 15 pax.
Military Travel Clearance is the client own responsibility to have before travel (if needed).
